articles.title: Kamala Harris says evacuating Americans, Afghan allies is Biden admin's 'highest priority' - Fox News
articles.description: Vice President Kamala Harris said evacuating Americans and U.S. allies in Afghanistan is the administration’s "highest priority" while answering reporters’ questions in Vietnam on Thursday.
articles.content:
Vice President Kamala Harris said evacuating Americans and U.S. allies in Afghanistan is the administrations "highest priority" while answering reporters questions in Vietnam on Thursday.

articles.title: Marvel's Midnight Suns is a turn-based superhero game from 'XCOM' creators - USA TODAY
articles.description: Marvel's Midnight Suns is a turn-based tactics game where players will fight alongside Marvel heroes including Iron Man, Captain America, and more.
articles.content:
Video game fans know studio Firaxis for their games focused on building civilizations or marshaling soldiers in battles against alien invaders.
